meta.name: Tech Minimal
meta.description: 极简科技风格，黑白灰配色，适合技术文档、API说明

base.container: background-color: #ffffff; color: #1a1a1a; font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.7; padding: 24px;

header_window.title_style: color: #1a1a1a; font-size: 11px; font-weight: 600; letter-spacing: 1px; text-transform: uppercase;

headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

text.code_inline: background-color: #f0f0f0; color: #1a1a1a; padding: 3px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'SF Mono', monospace; font-size: 85%;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #1a1a1a; color: #e0e0e0; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin: 20px 0; font-size: 13px; overflow-x: auto;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #f8f9fa; border-left: 3px solid #0066ff; color: #4a4a4a; padding: 12px 16px; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 0 4px 4px 0;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #fff3cd; border-left: 3px solid #ffc107; color: #856404; padding: 12px 16px; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 0 4px 4px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #f5f5f5; border: 1px solid #e0e0e0; color: #999999; padding: 24px; text-align: center; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 8px;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 48px; padding-top: 24px; border-top: 1px solid #e0e0e0; text-align: center;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
